package_required_desc: To access this page install the required packages showed below

docs.guestAccess_info: Access to the shared folder is granted even if invalid credentials are provided.
docs.everyone_info: A guest, or an authorized user that does not match any ACL.
docs.audit_log: Enable this option to save read actions inside the database. If the option is not checked, read actions will be logged inside /var/log/smbaudit.log but will not be saved inside the database.

sharedfolders.title: 共享目录
sharedfolders.empty_state_message: A shared folder is a place where files can be accessed by a group of people using Samba (SMB/CIFS).
sharedfolders.migrate_warning_message: This shared folder will be deleted and all data will be moved inside the virtual host.
sharedfolders.migrate_confirm_message: Migrate the shared folder to virtual host {vhost}?
sharedfolders.reset_permissions_warning_message: Depending on the shared folder content size, it might require some time to run.
sharedfolders.reset_permissions_confirm_message: Reset permissions to default value on files and sub-folders of shared folder {name}?
sharedfolders.delete_warning_message: All files in {name} will be deleted. This action cannot be reverted!
sharedfolders.Acl_placeholder: Search a user or group name...
sharedfolders.SmbRecycleBinVersionsStatus_label: Keep copies of files with the same name
sharedfolders.no_acls_support_title: Access to shared folders is possible only as guest.
sharedfolders.no_acls_support_message: To enable Samba authentication and special access options configure an Active Directory accounts provider.
sharedfolders.ibay_enabled_ok: The shared folder has been enabled
sharedfolders.ibay_disabled_ok: The shared folder has been disabled

settings.title: 设置
settings.inherit_owner: When directory is created in share folder
settings.grant_home_dir: Grant full control on home directories to Domain Admins group (home$ share)
settings.grant_share_dir: Grant full control on shared folders to Domain Admins group
settings.yes_inherit: Grant full control to the owner of the parent directory
settings.no_inherit: Grant full control to the creator

validation.ibay-create,ibay-length,1: Too long! Must be less than 30 chars long
validation.valid_hostname_simple_0_0: Must be a simple hostname like 'WORKGROUP'
validation.malformed_acls: The ACL value {value} cannot be applied
validation.must_be_ascii: Must contain only ASCII characters: special characters, like accented letters, are not valid
